p: In contrast, the NAs of B/YAM viruses carrying D342S or A395T NA substitutions had a reduced V max ( P < 0.05). The higher V max of the influenza A virus NA may facilitate the release and spread of A/PR8-S331G and A/PR8-S331R viruses, but the higher K m indicates that the NA has a low affinity for its substrate. These results suggest that the NA substitutions contribute to the reduction in NA enzymatic activity.
